name: A Snow Fort Too Far
description:
A Snow Fort Too Far is an online multiplayer strategy game where you take control of an army of snowball wielding kids trying to control all the flags on a map.

Build an army composition to destroy your enemies,

You can recruit:
Soldiers: Wielders of snowballs hurlers of icy annihilation.
Defenders: Armed with a garbage can lid for a shield, they can soak up damage.
Builders: The shovel toting engineers.  Capable of building or destroying a structure in seconds. 

You can build and destroy:
Snow Forts: Fortifications to protect your soldiers and earn you income.
Snowmen: Statues that unlock your special abilities.

Build and destroy Snow Forts and Snowmen, destroy your opponents and take over the map.
